Package entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
      • entities.Creature
        • entities.Player
  • public class Player
extends Creature
    The player class is an extended class of the abstract class Entity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player​(Handler handler,
              float x,
              float y,
              int width,
              int height,
              java.lang.String name)
        the player starts at Level 1 The player class has 2 animation attached to it. the bounds( for collision detection) are changed in the constructor
        Parameters:
        x - first value for coordination
        y - second value for coordination
        name - an Id as String to name it
        handler - the class variable handler, in order to draw
        width - the width variable in px
        height - the height variable in px
